titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation touching the currencie of certaine French coyne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Court at White-hall, the 24. day of Iuly, in the second yeere of his Highnesse Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
